data.text: @ICOnews And your going to do what? Toothless and useless organisation
@ICOnews Needs enforcement action not just a reprimand
@ICOnews It was two years ago that I first told you that @scotgov were not compliant with Data Protection. Nice to see absolutely nothing has changed!
@ICOnews Just a reprimand?  Why no proper enforcement action?  No fines, enforcement or assessment notices?
